Operation 'firebasestorage.projects.buckets.addFirebase' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary entirely. Added details about the bucket resource name requirement, return value, and the implications of the link operation for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Links a Google Cloud Storage bucket to a Firebase project.
data.summary_suggestion: Link Cloud Storage bucket to Firebase project
data.description_suggestion: Links an existing Google Cloud Storage bucket to a Firebase project, enabling Firebase integration and access controls. Requires the bucket resource name and valid Firebase project context. Returns the updated Bucket resource with Firebase project association. This operation establishes the relationship between the bucket and the Firebase project, enabling Firebase-specific features and security rules.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on what inputs are required (bucket parameter), what is returned (Bucket object), and the side effects of linking (enables Firebase features). Added details about the bucket resource name requirement, return value, and the implications of the link operation for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'firebasestorage.projects.buckets.removeFirebase' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description is vague about inputs and outputs. Added clarity on the bucket parameter requirement, the return value (empty response), and critical side effects: the bucket is preserved but Firebase features are removed. This helps AI agents understand the non-destructive nature of the operation.

data.current_description: Unlinks a linked Google Cloud Storage bucket from a Firebase project.
data.summary_suggestion: Unlink Cloud Storage bucket from Firebase project
data.description_suggestion: Unlinks a Google Cloud Storage bucket from a Firebase project, removing Firebase integration while preserving the underlying bucket and its data. Requires the bucket resource name. Returns an empty response on success. This operation removes the Firebase project association but does not delete the bucket or its contents. Firebase-specific features and security rules will no longer apply.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is vague about inputs and outputs. Added clarity on the bucket parameter requirement, the return value (empty response), and critical side effects: the bucket is preserved but Firebase features are removed. This helps AI agents understand the non-destructive nature of the operation.

data.current_description: Unlinks and deletes the default bucket.
data.summary_suggestion: Delete and unlink default storage bucket
data.description_suggestion: Deletes the default Cloud Storage bucket and unlinks it from the Firebase project. Requires the default bucket resource name. Returns an empty response on success. This operation permanently removes the default bucket and all its contents from Cloud Storage and disassociates it from the Firebase project. This action is irreversible and will delete all data stored in the default bucket.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks critical details about the destructive nature of this operation, the input parameter (resource name), and the return value. Added explicit warnings about permanent deletion and data loss, which is essential for AI agents to understand the severity and irreversibility of this action.
